transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan ji madam, namaskar.
Customer: Haan ji hello sir, very good morning, Sunderlal ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan ji madam.
Customer: Ji very good morning sir, kaise ho aap?
Executive: Bas madam, theek hu ji, aap sunaiye.
Customer: [inaudible] thank you. Abhi aapne sir call kiya tha mujhe, hai na?
Executive: Haan madam, kiya tha maine call aapko.
Customer: Ji, actually meeting mein the isliye [inaudible].
Executive: Achha achha.
Executive: Okay, koi nahi bahen ji, koi nahi, koi nahi bahen ji. Koi baat nahi.
Customer: Ji. Koi baat nahi. Baki aapne fir uske baad customer care number pe call kiya tha, hai na?
Executive: Nahi, usi number par kiya tha maine to khali.
Customer: Haan, mere number pe kiya tha, maine nahi uthaya tha, utha paya to woh IndiaMART se forward ho gaya isliye. Koi baat nahi, aapko kuch [inaudible].
Executive: Haan, haan ji bataiye sir, aapne call kiya tha?
Executive: Haan, main kya hai madam ke kuch producton, kuch product portal par dale the maine.
Executive: Woh show nahi ho rahe hain. Kya baat hai yeh kuch, haan ji.
Customer: Ek second rukiye, main aapka profile open karti hu.
Executive: Abhi kya hai na mera, ek mera gel hai Vitcall ke naam se, to woh ek, ek party hai Odisha se, woh check kar rahi thi, unko mila nahi IndiaMART par. Haan ji, to abhi ek party hai mere paas mein unka.
Executive: Maine, yeh unka tha bhai.
Executive: Bhai sahab, SV Call hai na?
Executive: SV Call calcium hai madam 5 liter ka, woh jo hai IndiaMART show nahi kar raha hai, zara dekhna ek baar.
Customer: Haan sir, kaun sa product hai bataiye wapas.
Executive: Ek to hai ji Vitcall gel, woh Odisha ki party aayi woh search kar rahi thi, unko mil nahi raha hai. Vitcall gel karke.
Executive: Aur ek, SV Call.
Customer: Haan ji Vitcall gel aur ek, ek 5 liter calcium pack hai, SV Call. Haan. SV Call DS karke.
Customer: Woh bhi nahi. Bas ek minute rukiye main aapko [inaudible].
Executive: Haan ji dekh lo madam ek baar aap.
Customer: Ji, G Call Gold hai kya sir, G Call karke?
Executive: Nahi. Nahi, G Call Gold to hai madam, SV Call DS.
Customer: Okay sir. G Call ke alawa to koi bhi nahi hai calcium supplement maine aapke [inaudible] bhi dekh liye.
Executive: Haan, wahi to abhi upload kiya tha.
Customer: Upload kiya tha?
Executive: Yeh, waha 15-16 din pehle upload kiya tha madam aur yeh hamari Vitcall gel karke hai, yeh to humne pichle saal upload kiya tha, samajh lo aapke [inaudible] nahi hai lekin yeh hai sir, G Vit veterinary growth ka water aisa hai, Vitcall [inaudible].
Executive: Aisa kare madam, aap mere ko WhatsApp par na hi bol de, to main aapko bhej deta hu picture, aap unko upload kara dena please.
Customer: Haan, ek second main na abhi hand to hand hi kar deti hu upload, don't worry, aap mujhe na product ka naam bata do mujhe, kya hai? Vitcall.
Executive: Haan ji Vitcall gel.
Customer: Perfect. Vitcall gel hai na sir? Pura proper naam iska yahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji Vitcall gel.
Customer: Theek hai isme Vit, Call gel hai na sir?
Executive: Haan ji. Theek hai maine yeh product aapka add kar diya hai, iska pricing kitna hai mujhe jaldi jaldi bata dijiye aap.
Executive: Madam 168 karke kuch.
Customer: 168 rupees, yeh bottle mein aata hai sir, bottle mein aata hai na?
Executive: Ji, yeh bottle mein aata hai, long neck bottle mein.
Executive: Wohi to, wohi to bola maine, main iska photo dal dunga na aapko to fir aapko aasaani rahegi.
Customer: Koi baat nahi, mujhe itna bata dijiye, ab kuch cheezein hai jo mujhe jaldi jaldi add karni hai. Packaging size iska kya hai? 50 gram, 100 gram, 500 gram, 300 ml.
Executive: 300 ml, 300 ml, 300 ml.
Customer: 30 ml?
Executive: Nahi, 300 ml, 300 ml, haan ji.
Customer: Theek hai. Skin type kaise skin ke liye hota hai? Oily skin, dry skin, combination skin, [inaudible] all type.
Executive: Nahi, oral hai. All type. Yeh likh, yeh madam, ionic calcium hota hai yeh. Ionic calcium.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Achha isme packaging type bottle hai, from cream gel, gel hai na yeh sir?
Executive: Vitcall gel haan.
Customer: Theek hai. Made in India and baki iska minimum order quantity kitna bottle rakhoge sir aap?
Executive: Kitna iska ji 40 bottle.
Customer: 40 bottles?
Executive: Haan ji 40 bottles.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Okay, yeh maine aapka add kar diya hai. Vitcall gel sir yeh basically kya hai? Herbal gel mein aata hai ya calcium [inaudible] pe kya hai yeh?
Executive: Ji. Yeh madam ionic gel hai, calcium supplement hota hai yeh.
Customer: Calcium supplement hota hai na?
Executive: Haan ji madam.
Customer: Theek hai to main calcium supplement ko move karungi [inaudible].
Customer: Theek hai. Yaha likh deti hu Vitcall gel calcium supplement, theek hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Calcium supplement. Baki sir mere ko iska, aapke product maine add kar diya hai, sab kuch add kar diya hai, theek hai? Bas ab mujhe kya chahiye, mujhe is product ka aapko photos chahiye, kyuki aapka original product hai to I hope aap yeh original photos bhi rakhte honge, hai na sir?
Executive: Bilkul ji.
Customer: Haan to mujhe iska sir se aapko photo chahiye, baki maine aapka product add kar diya aapke profile mein. Ab aapko dikh jayega, bas isme photos add nahi hai to photo aap mere ko bhej do, main WhatsApp pe aapko hi kar deti hu usi wale message pe, theek hai?
Executive: Aur, ek aur hai madam meri. Haan ji. SV Call DS calcium hai 5 liter ka.
Executive: Nahi, aap aisa kare madam, mere ko hai na WhatsApp par hi bol do, aap na jo bhi product mera dikhai nahi de raha hai, main usi ko dal, dal deta hu aapko. Mera account aap hi sambhalte ho kya?
Executive: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Sir leti hu WhatsApp pe hi hi bol deti hu, theek hai?
Executive: Hello madam, suniye zara. Haan ji.
Executive: Mera account aap hi dekhte ho kya?
Customer: Haan main hi dekhti hu sir, actually mujhe na aap se pehle bhi baat karni thi but us time aap thode busy the na, aapne aapne mere ko gussa kiya tha, mere manager ko aapne bola tha. Koi baat nahi, ab mujhe iska bhi bata do sir, ek in- incorrect jo price hai, yeh Shialo animal syrup price hai.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Iska per portion kitna price hai iska?
Executive: Shialo ka?
Customer: Haan, Shialo animal syrup, 500 ml wala hai.
Executive: Achha achha woh madam kya hai na ki yeh to main aapko dekh ke, main abhi duty par hu, main aapko 2 baje ke baad hi bata paunga sab kuch aapko main.
Customer: Achha koi baat nahi, fir aap 3 baje ke baad bataiyega kyuki sir 2 baje se 3 baje tak hamara fir break hota hai, thoda lunch wagera ka time hota hai sir.
Executive: Koi nahi madam, main aur main gussa karne ke liye sorry, main kya hai na ki thoda sa yeh, yeh, yeh pareshan karte rehte hain na humko. To koi hai na main hai na aap, aapko madam jo bhi mere product hai na woh main aapko dal dunga main 3 baje ke baad, haan ji.
Customer: Theek hai sir, main aapko abhi WhatsApp pe bhi hi bolti hu, aap mere ko waha pe photo share kar do.
Executive: Theek hai ji madam.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Products not showing on IndiaMART portal.

- Vitcall gel and SV Call calcium not visible.

- Incorrect price for Shialo animal syrup.



Resolution:

- Executive added Vitcall gel to the profile.

- Agreed to share product photos via WhatsApp.

- Will check and inform about Shialo syrup price.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send 'Hi' on WhatsApp.

- Executive to share product photos.

- Executive to provide Shialo syrup price after 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product visibility, catalog, whatsapp, pricing, calcium
